cast.name: 根纳季·罗杰斯特文斯基 Gennadi Rozhdestvensky

writer.name: 布鲁诺·蒙桑容 Bruno Monsaingeon

director.name: 布鲁诺·蒙桑容 Bruno Monsaingeon

trans_title: 红色指挥棒 罗日杰斯特文斯基：指挥家或是施法者
introduction: Russia's rich classical music heritage provides the subject for this pair of films from director Bruno Monsaingeon. "The Red Baton - Scenes of musical life in Stalinist Russia" examines surprisingly thriving music scene during the Soviet era, and "Gennady Rozhdestvensky: Conductor or Conjuror?" features the noted conductor discussing his art.Amazon.com entry:http://www.amazon.com/Notes-Interdites-DVD-Video-Rozhdestvensky/dp/B0012K53UE
chinese_title: 红色指挥棒 罗日杰斯特文斯基：指挥家或是施法者
foreign_title: Notes Interdites: The Red Baron/Gennadi Eozhdestvensky: Conductor or Conjuror?
